Short: This is Junlin here, but you can just call me Jun (pronounced like the month, but without the 'e').
I am excited that you happened to stumble upon my little personal website.
To tell you a little about myself, I am a software developer stationed in Toronto, Ontario.
I am currently pursuing my studies at the University of Toronto, specializing in computer science - software engineering stream.
I started coding because it was enjoyable to see something you designed and created, just come alive; there's something interesting about that.

Apart from programming, I usually partake in a bunch of hobbies, pertaining but not limited to rock climbing (bouldering, top rope and lead), playing the guitar (I am a huge fan of the acoustic sound), singing, watching movies (especially horror) and occasionally gaming.
Anyways, thank you for reading this segment, and I hope you enjoy the rest of my website.
